name: Thunderstrike - High Ruler Perun
text:
2 Level 7 Thunder type monsters 
 (Quick Effect) If your opponent adds a card(s) from their Deck to their hand, except during the Draw Phase: Detach 1 Xyz material from this card; attach those card(s) to this card as Xyz material. You can only activate this effect of "Thunderstrike - High Ruler Perun" once per turn. This card gains 500 ATK for each Xyz material attached to it.
